m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Let’s take the power to the people Chris Cooper June 20, 2016, 10 p.m. The foundations have been laid for the greatest transformation of our energy system since electrification. REVOLUTION: We need to lower the costs of solar and storage even further so that it’s a ‘no-brainer’ investment for residents. Our society has benefited enormously from access to cheap coal.
